mapper.update:
UPDATE t_user_info
userStatus = #{userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
openUserName = #{openUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
openUserTime = #{openUserTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
closeUserTime = #{closeUserTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
closeUserName = #{closeUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND userId = #{userInfoBean.userId,jdbcType=CHAR}

UPDATE t_user_info
authIp = #{authIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telePhone = #{telePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
merchantId = #{merchantId,jdbcType=CHAR},
userDescribe = #{userDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickName = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
roleId = #{roleId,jdbcType=CHAR},
userName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobilePhone = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=CHAR},
AND userId = #{userInfoBean.userId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT *
FROM t_user_info
AND loginName = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
LIMIT 0,1

SELECT userId
FROM t_user_info
AND roleId = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
LIMIT 0,1
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_user_info
lastLoginIp = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
loginTime = #{loginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
loginIp = #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
loginTotal = #{loginTotal,jdbcType=BIGINT},
lastLoginTime = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AND userId = #{userInfoBean.userId,jdbcType=CHAR}
